message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your specific needs. Given its high value and quality, we believe it would significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Considering its worth to us and its potential impact on you, I propose a price of $12,000 for this exceptional item. This offer is tailored to provide you with a competitive advantage while ensuring we receive a fair return for our investment. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information to make an informed decision.
